scripts.test-npm: npx npm-jetpack --releaseSuffix -alpha --gitCommit true && npm run update
scripts.update: node core/deploy.js --gitCommit true --doPublish true && npm run test-js && npm publish
scripts.update-minor: node core/deploy.js --minor --gitCommit true --doPublish true && npm run test-js && npm publish
scripts.update-major: node core/deploy.js --major --gitCommit true --doPublish true && npm run test-js && npm publish
